definition: paper/CL:張|张[zhang1],沓[da2]/classifier for documents, letter etc
"silk" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 120), occurring in 红, 绿, 累 etc/also pr. [mi4]
see 月氏[Yue4 zhi1] and 閼氏|阏氏[yan1 zhi1]
papercutting (Chinese folk art)/to make paper cutouts

sentences.english: One woman said she had scribbled "California" on her paper.
sentences.chinese: 一个女人说她在纸上草草写了“加州”这个词。

sentences.english: Place on a prepared tray, brush the tops lightly with egg.
sentences.chinese: 放在铺好烤纸的烤盘上，刷上蛋液入预热烤箱。

sentences.english: Fig1. Paper is staple food supposing office is restaurant.
sentences.chinese: 如果办公室是个餐馆，纸应该是每天消耗最多的主食。

sentences.english: Folded in the card was a piece of paper.
sentences.chinese: 只见生日卡里夹着一张折叠起来的纸。

sentences.english: Whenever sad time, god of destiny will be a silver pen on paper drawing a circle.
sentences.chinese: 每当悲伤一次，命运之神便会用银笔在纸上画一个圈。

sentences.english: Now lift up your weight and put the second section on top.
sentences.chinese: 拿开你的重物，放上第二页纸。

sentences.english: Paper is made up of transparent fibers.
sentences.chinese: 纸是由透明纤维构成的。

sentences.english: For instance, some clandestine publications are beautifully produced. Well, where did the paper come from?
sentences.chinese: 举例说，有些秘密刊物印得那么漂亮，哪儿来的纸？

sentences.english: The quality of paper matters when writing with pointed brushes.
sentences.chinese: 纸的质量问题时，尖刷写。

sentences.english: Boring white paper? Too commonplace. Let's find something a little more eyecatching.
sentences.chinese: 乏味的白色的纸？太普通了，得找个稍微抢眼的。

sentences.english: He was holding one end of a ribbon of crepe paper tied to a post.
sentences.chinese: 他拿着一个完一个丝带的绉纸捆绑到一个职位。

sentences.english: I stared at the sheets of paper lying facedown on the printer.
sentences.chinese: 我盯着打印机里面朝下搁着的一摞纸。

sentences.english: The new fine paper line will be taken into use in the first quarter of 2011.
sentences.chinese: 新的薄页纸生产线将在2011年第一季度投入使用。

sentences.english: Colour crepe paper is a kind of paper of widely used.
sentences.chinese: 彩色绉纹纸是广泛应用的一个纸张品种。

sentences.english: You can draw them on paper or on white boards.
sentences.chinese: 可以将其画在纸上或白板上。

definition: a piece, scrap or fragment of paper
fine writing paper, originally from Jing county 涇縣|泾县, Xuancheng 宣城, Anhui
fine paper made from bamboo, used for calligraphy, painting etc/also written 毛邊|毛边[mao2 bian1]
